AuthorName.Title: A systematic review of transfer learning in software engineering
AuthorName.Content: Twitter] ;LinkedIn] Facebook] R Malhotra, S Meena - Multimedia Tools and Applications, 2024Nowadays, everyone requires a good quality software. The quality of software can't be assured due to lack of data availability for training, and testing.
